ProductInfo.Features:
Bright 65-in 1,920 x 1080 Full-HD LED display for improved outdoor viewing
Powder-coated aluminum housing protects internal components from weathering effects such as rain, humidity and dust
Multi-fan airflow system keeps unit cool and dry in temperatures up to 122 Degrees F
Internal thermostatically controlled heater protects TV from freezing in temperatures as low as -40 Degrees F
Innovative water-tight cable entry system seals out moisture and dust while allowing for easy hook-ups
ProductInfo.Name: Factory-Reconditioned SunBriteTV SB-6560HD-BL-R Signature Series 65 in. 1080p 240 Hz LED Full-HD True Outdoor All-Weather TV (Black)
